original_text: I tell you this. You should say clearly to other people, “I believe in Jesus.” If you do this, I, the Son of Man, will say to the angels of God, “This is someone who is my disciple.”
korean_text: 내가 또한 너희에게 말하노니 누구든지 사람 앞에서 나를 시인하면 인자도 하나님의 사자들 앞에서 그를 시인할 것이요

sentences.original_text: You should say clearly to other people
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 다른 사람들에게 분명히 말해야 한다

sentences.original_text: will say to the angels of God
This is someone who is my disciple.
